snippet: Pedro Hernandez was charged for the murder and kidnapping of the 6-year-old boy in 1979 in a case that changed perceptions across the country about how closely children should be watched.
abstract: Pedro Hernandez is charged with second-degree murder and first-degree kidnappingin connection with the 1979 murder and kidnapping of 6-year-old Etan Patz; spokesman for the Manhattan district attorney's office says that indictment came after lengthy and deliberative investigation in the face of initial strong doubts about the reliability of Hernandez's confession.
lead_paragraph: Pedro Hernandez was charged for the murder and kidnapping of the 6-year-old boy in 1979 in a case that changed perceptions across the country about how closely children should be watched.

headline.seo: Pedro Hernandez Is Indicted in Killing of Etan Patz
headline.main: Grand Jury Indicts Man in ’79 Killing of Etan Patz
headline.print_headline: Grand Jury Indicts Man Who Confessed to 1979 Patz Killing
